forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 69 in the afternoon. West wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 5 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
The sun casts a warm embrace over Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, illuminating the city with a gentle glow that beckons one outdoors. The temperature dances close to a pleasant 72 degrees, gradually softening to about 69 as the day inches towards twilight. A lively west wind, rustling through the streets at 20 mph and flinging a few wayward leaves into the air, adds a refreshing edge to the atmosphere. The skies remain mostly clear, with only hints of the ever-mysterious marine layer lurking along the fringes, promising an evening as clear as the day has been bright.

As dusk approaches, the clear expanse will transition to a comforting coolness, settling around 59 degrees after the sun has slipped below the horizon. Those venturing out should consider a light sweater or a comfortable jacket to ward off the evening chill, especially with the soft breeze echoing around the block. Embrace this ideal weather with simple pleasures: stroll through a local park, sip a fragrant cup of tea at a nearby café, or perhaps lose yourself in the pages of a good book while sitting by a window. In this serene backdrop, every moment feels like a gentle invitation to savor the fleeting joys of another beautiful San Francisco day.
